name: the endless summer
description:
my entry for molyjam 2012.

formerly available at the molyjam site here (rip).

i cannot precisely recall which molytweet it was based upon but i suspect it may have been this one:

You are a scarecrow in a world with just 1 bird Controls

Move mouse to move thine eyes.

Drink pairing: macro lager

Music pairing: NIN – Ghosts I-IV
